nodes.text: Star Wars 37 is the thirty-seventh issue of the Marvel comic book series Star Wars. It was written by Jason Aaron and illustrated by Salvador Larroca. It was released on October 4, 2017 It is the last issue of the series to be written by Aaron. Kieron Gillen became the series' writer on issue 38. The issue also includes a backup story titled "The Sand Will Provide".
Salvador Larocca Picks His Top 5 Moments Drawing Marvel's Star Wars on StarWars.com (backup link)
